data.description: Create and solve Jumble word games
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
I've recently had to create Jumble word games and didn't find any
    module on CPAN to do this, so I've uploaded my simple Jumble
    creator.

    I've also considered naming the module Games::Jumble, but this
    module only builds and solves jumbles, it's not the actual game
    itself. All opinions gladly accepted.
